title: LumaFusion, a popular video editor on iOS, is coming to Android in the ‘first half’ of 2022
content:
Thanks to the popularity and power of the iPad, it’s not uncommon for some professional-level utilities to make their way to iOS before Android. After announcing its Android version last year, LumaFusion has confirmed that it will debut on Android in the first half of 2022.

more…

The post LumaFusion, a popular video editor on iOS, is coming to Android in the ‘first half’ of 2022 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung has confirmed that the video editing app LumaFusion is coming to Android in the first half of 2022, at least to the Galaxy Store.
